title: An Act in relation to James J. O'Neil Park

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Reyes of Lawrence and Moran of Lawrence, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4614) of Estela A. Reyes and Frank A. Moran (with the approval of the mayor and city council) that the city of Lawrence be authorized to transfer a certain parcel of park land at the James J. O'Neil Park in said city.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/31/2025 from 11:00 AM-02:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee as changed and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting
Read second and ordered to a third reading
